aston.vehicles

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.vehicles.Vehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FamilySedan, Motorbike, SmallCar

    public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    A superclass for vehicles, extended by Family Sedan, Motorbike, Small Car. The vehicle takes up a certain amount of space and it has a tank that needs to be filled.
    Version:
    27/03/2017
    Author:
    Tristan P. , Matas B., Kelvin M. and Milton R.
